biotools.summary: High-Speed Processing of VCF, FASTA and Alignment Data. Also provides easy-to-use interfaces to genome annotation from UCSC and Bioconductor and gene ontology data from AmiGO. It is capable to read, modify and write PLINK .PED-format pedigree files.

bioschemas.name: WhopGenome
bioschemas.summary: High-Speed Processing of VCF, FASTA and Alignment Data. Also provides easy-to-use interfaces to genome annotation from UCSC and Bioconductor and gene ontology data from AmiGO. It is capable to read, modify and write PLINK .PED-format pedigree files.
